meta.content: From phones, AI, laptops, autos, smart home, video games and entertainment, we’ve tested all of the latest products and tech for the way you live.
From phones, AI, laptops, autos, smart home, video games and entertainment, we’ve tested all of the latest products and tech for the way you live.

div.div: The New York Times crossword puzzle can be tough, even if it isn't the Sunday issue! If you're stuck, we're here to help you out with today's clues and answers.

h3.a: Android 16 put a digital bodyguard on my phone and you must enable it

div.div: Away from the splashy new design and a built-in desktop mode, Android 16 introduces two new safety features that will protect your phone like a vigilant knight.

div.div: These underrated Netflix movies, including a terrific horror entry, are all well worth your time this weekend.

img.alt: Two teen boys talk in Heartstopper.

div.div: These underrated Netflix shows are a reminder of all the ways you can be entertained by the streaming service.

img.alt: Anker's PowerCore 10000 power bank.

h3.a: Anker recalls a million power banks over fire risk — here’s what to do

div.div: A popular Anker power bank has been recalled due to a safety risk. Find out if yours is affected, and what you should do if it is.

img.alt: A man with a computer stands next to two kids in Interstellar.

h3.a: 3 great free movies to stream this weekend (June 13-15)

div.div: Stream these free movies from June 13-15: a music documentary, a potential masterpiece from an Oscar winner, and a ‘90s action thriller.
